name: Black Ant
description:
♥ Intense shoe-dodging leaf-eating action! ♥

Ant vs. a cruel world!

Black Ant was strolling around the neighborhood when she realized she was right in the middle of a biweekly block party! The smell of sizzling BBQ ribs singed her antennae, and a squirt of ketchup blocked her path. Suddenly, a shoe appeared and nearly SMAAAASHED!! poor Black Ant. How will she make it home to her family?

Header/cover art by carpetbones
